definition: a list of people who are out of favor, to put on a list so as to banish or cause to be boycotted
details:
noun
- a list of people who are out of favor
= synonyms: black book, shitlist
verb
- to put on a list so as to banish or cause to be boycotted
= example: to put on a list so as to banish or cause to be boycotted
